stellarite_ore.name: Stellarite Ore
stellarite_ore.desc: Common space ore with a dull metallic sheen.

ferrite_ore.desc: Green-tinged ferrous ore from iron-rich asteroids.

cobaltium_ore.name: Cobaltium Ore
cobaltium_ore.desc: Blue-tinged ore found in deep asteroid pockets.

duranite_ore.name: Duranite Ore
duranite_ore.desc: Teal crystalline ore of extreme hardness.

titanex_ore.desc: Yellow-green ore with reactive titanium compounds.

plasmite_ore.name: Plasmite Ore
plasmite_ore.desc: Superheated ore glowing with inner plasma.

quantite_ore.desc: Quantum-entangled ore that flickers between states.

neutronium_ore.name: Neutronium Ore
neutronium_ore.desc: Ultra-dense ore from collapsed star fragments.

darkmatter_shard.name: Darkmatter Shard
darkmatter_shard.desc: Exotic shard of condensed dark matter.

ascendant_alloy.desc: Transcendent alloy fused from the three rarest metals.

corrupted_essence.name: Corrupted Essence
corrupted_essence.desc: Raw corruption crystallized from dimensional rifts.

gravity_residue.desc: Warped matter left by a Gravlurk.

abyssal_ichor.name: Abyssal Ichor
abyssal_ichor.desc: Dark fluid harvested from creatures of the abyss.

space_lichen.name: Space Lichen
space_lichen.desc: Edible lichen scraped from station walls.

alien_steak.name: Alien Steak
alien_steak.desc: Thick slab of unidentified alien meat.

plasma_pepper.name: Plasma Pepper
plasma_pepper.desc: A pepper that generates its own heat.

void_truffle.name: Void Truffle
void_truffle.desc: Extremely rare fungus from the void.

solar_grain.name: Solar Grain
solar_grain.desc: Golden grain grown under solar lamps.

spore_cap.name: Spore Cap
spore_cap.desc: Fleshy mushroom cap from the wastes.

quantum_yeast.name: Quantum Yeast
quantum_yeast.desc: Living culture that exists in multiple states.

grain_bowl.desc: Toasted solar grain bowl. Heals 200 HP.

alien_burger.desc: Grilled alien steak burger. Heals 350 HP.

void_feast.name: Void Feast

quantum_risotto.name: Quantum Risotto
quantum_risotto.desc: Grain risotto with quantum yeast. Heals 1250 HP.

fortified_wrap.name: Fortified Wrap

energized_smoothie.name: Energized Smoothie

berserker_burger.name: Berserker Burger

focused_curry.name: Focused Curry

titan_steak.name: Titan Steak
titan_steak.desc: Colossal steak. Heals 500 HP, +15 damage for 3 min.

void_elixir_food.name: Void Elixir
void_elixir_food.desc: Void-infused elixir. Heals 600 HP, +8 all stats for 3 min.

explorers_lunchbox.name: Explorer's Lunchbox
explorers_lunchbox.desc: Packed meal for long expeditions. Heals 900 HP, +20% speed for 3 min.

warlords_feast.name: Warlord's Feast
warlords_feast.desc: A feast fit for conquest. Heals 1400 HP, +20 damage for 4 min.

mega_serum.name: Mega Serum
mega_serum.desc: Ultimate serum. +12 all stats for 3 min.

signal_flare.name: Signal Flare
signal_flare.desc: Reveals nearby enemies on minimap for 30s.

raw_voidgem.desc: Rare gem from deep space rock.

cut_voidgem.desc: Precision-cut void gem of great value.

transcendent_hood.desc: Hood of pure psionic energy. Best-in-slot headgear.

viper_venom_sac.name: Viper Venom Sac

drake_wing_shard.name: Drake Wing Shard
drake_wing_shard.desc: Fragment of a sun drake's wing.

solaris_core.name: Solaris Core

solar_ingot.name: Solar Ingot
solar_ingot.desc: Smelted from solarite ore. Radiates warmth.

solarite_ore.name: Solarite Ore
solarite_ore.desc: Sun-forged ore glowing with inner heat.

obsidian_ore.name: Obsidian Ore

mirage_bloom.desc: Iridescent desert flower visible only at dusk.

sovereign_crown_shard.name: Sovereign Crown Shard
sovereign_crown_shard.desc: Fragment of the Void Sovereign's crown.

void_elixir.name: Void Elixir

void_alloy.name: Void Alloy
void_alloy.desc: Alloy forged in the void between dimensions.
